relation: Great for these types of students
It has a great CE and EE department.
You come out knowing how to be a good leader.
When you get free time being in Charleston it is a beautiful city, take a walk around it, go see a movie, or hang out with your friends.
Food there isn't as good as they promise there is no way that it is healthy.
You are stuck there most of the time so you past the times with your friends.
The engineering degree is harder there because they turn a 5 year degree into a 4 year degree.
It's not for everyone but when you finish knob year you have accomplished something great.
It breaks people down to build them back up. It's engineering departments are the best departments there. It makes you feel like you can do anything.
pageTitle: Citadel Military College of South Carolina Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {46985=The Citadel is located in Charleston, SC, which was recently voted as the 2012 Number 1 city to visit in the U.S., and featured in National Geographic's Traveller's Edition! The fun is endless in that city!, 95590=The entire school. Founded in 1842, this school is based off of tradition. There are many very old traditions., 125303=© 2015, Cappex.com, LLC, 8401=Honor, Duty and Respect....those three words are now ingrained in my mind, and I'm becoming a better person all around from having only been a part of The Citadel since August 13, 2011. The work is challenging, but not impossible if you put your mind to it.}

textAfterTable: Bang for the buck As a freshman you may not truly see it but in the long-term you will Am enjoying being here Freshmen will have a different experience but after that experince you will truly enjoy being at The Citadel Am learning a lot Depending on your major here especially the Civil Engineering major but there are plenty of people to help, and keep you on course with your studies whatever they be Login to rate or flag the reviews Citadel Knob 11/29/2011 Reviewer is A current student here. 3 out of 3 people found this review useful. 3 of 28 Categories Comments Great for these types of students The Citadel is great for any male or female who is not afraid of hard work. You will see a change in yourself after being there for two months, and will continue to change
